channel.title: Need help with client/server (connection problem)
channel.description:
I would like all coders to help me find out what is the problem that don't let me connect to my server it only lets trough localhost I tested on my friends computer and it wont let me connect to it I have portforwarded and this isn't my first server but I don't know what to do never have had this kind of problem
I used Innovation X No Leach and it works about 99% because if you try to change the client ip that it connects to then it doesn't change and the server itself doesn't bind to a port you can have a server running already and you will still be able to connect to the server so I don't really know what to do I have never had any experience fixing this problem I have tried to fix it for a couple weeks now.
I hope you can help with this problem its not solved yet as far as I know so help me solve it I will credit you on my server when its opened
If you don't understand something post and I will try to explain or to show

item.title: Need help with client/server (connection problem)
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

I would like all coders to help me find out what is the problem that don’t let me connect to my server it only lets trough localhost I tested on my friends computer and it wont let me connect to it I have portforwarded and this isn’t my first server but I don’t know what to do never have had this kind of problem

I used Innovation X No Leach and it works about 99% because if you try to change the client ip that it connects to then it doesn’t change and the server itself doesn’t bind to a port you can have a server running already and you will still be able to connect to the server so I don’t really know what to do I have never had any experience fixing this problem I have tried to fix it for a couple weeks now.

I hope you can help with this problem its not solved yet as far as I know so help me solve it I will credit you on my server when its opened

If you don’t understand something post and I will try to explain or to show
